sources.title: DzigaVertovSovietToys1924
sources.description: David Abelevich Kaufman (January 2 1896 – February 12, 1954)  also known as Denis Kaufman or his pseudonym Dziga Vertov or Vertof was a Soviet pioneer documentary film, newsreel director and cinema theorist. His filming practices and theories influenced the cinéma vérité style of documentary moviemaking and the Dziga Vertov Group, a radical filmmaking cooperative which was active in the 1960s.
